snippet.title: Soul Shuffler — Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Wishlist the game now!
https://store.steampowered.com/app/3032820

Soul Shuffler is a card-based roguelite about a demon specializing in the souls of inanimate objects.

Explore the ever-changing Limbo, defeat and collect the countless souls within, use them to expand your domain, and dominate the Infernal Tournament with your mad soul-shuffling skills to make Hell yours!

To be released on PC in 2025.
